programme.title: Les suffragettes
programme.desc:
(4) G.-B. 2015. The foot soldiers of the early feminist movement, women who were forced underground to pursue a dangerous game of cat and mouse with an increasingly brutal State.
Réalisation : Sarah Gavron
Avec : Carey Mulligan Anne-Marie Duff Helena Bonham Carter

programme.title: By Hook or By Cook
programme.desc: (S01EP04) Jenna has a hard time asking for help, but her tenacious and daring side is thirsty for adventure. She has always dreamed of flying and feeling the freedom of floating in the air.

programme.title: Site Unseen
programme.desc: Eager to own their first house, Beth and Cody bought one sight unseen and were faced with a harsh reality once they stepped inside. Follow along as the two turn an unlivable house into the accessible home of their dreams.

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc: (S09EP30) On débute l'émission avec le hockey inclusif et on poursuit avec la loi récente sur l'accessibilité en Colombie-Britannique. On vous présente aussi, une oreillette intelligente qui détecte plus rapidement l'Alzheimer ou le Parkinson.

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc:
Sara Singh, NDP MPP and Natalia Kusendova, Conservative MPP examine how to address the challenges of hospital capacity, bed shortages, and health program cuts in Ontario, in the pre- and post-COVID world.

programme.desc:
